title: How to Host a Trading Party on Animal Jam (Members)

steps.headline: Go to the parties tab at the top of the game's screen.
steps.description: You should see a balloon and party hat next to the Games tab.

steps.headline: Click "Host Your Own Party" button at the bottom of the tab.
Choose a name for your party.
Choose the "Trading" theme for your party.
Choose a song for your trading party.
steps.description: Beta Days is a pretty good one.

methods.name: Hosting a Trading Party in your Den

steps.headline: Buy a fun den.
steps.description: The Water Park Den is recommended. More people enjoy the party when you have that den (it has water slides!). It is also vast and beautiful. You can add chairs, towels, umbrellas and banners there to make it look like an official beach or waterpark.

steps.headline: Decorate your den.
steps.description:
Make it look totally awesome! If you don't know how to decorate your den, read this article. However, a few ideal looks are listed below: Put a Tiki Torch in the middle of the bottom-floor pool. Surround it with Tiki chairs or beach-chairs. At the ground, left of the pool, arrange 4-6 towels with umbrellas above them. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/dc\/Host-a-Trading-Party-on-Animal-Jam-%28Members%29-Step-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Host-a-Trading-Party-on-Animal-Jam-%28Members%29-Step-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/dc\/Host-a-Trading-Party-on-Animal-Jam-%28Members%29-Step-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Host-a-Trading-Party-on-Animal-Jam-%28Members%29-Step-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Go to Jamaa Township and say something like "Epic trading party, my den!"
steps.description: You can also advertise attractive things to get people to want to come. For example, you can say you're also hosting a small giveaway, etc.

steps.headline: Wait until at least 7-10 people are at your den.
steps.description: Then say "Last calling for a trading party in my den!" Don't go on for too long. Once there are 7-10 people at your den, go back. Your traders may not like it that you stay out advertising for too long.

steps.headline: If a lot of people are there, start trading and have fun!
steps.description: If not go back to Jamaa Township and repeat steps 3 and 4. Remember, no matter what happens, enjoy yourself like a true trader!

text:
Hosting a Jammer Party (One-Diamond Party) Go to the parties tab at the top of the game's screen. You should see a balloon and party hat next to the Games tab. Click "Host Your Own Party" button at the bottom of the tab. Choose a name for your party. Make it trading-related. Choose the "Trading" theme for your party. Choose a song for your trading party. Beta Days is a pretty good one. Click "Host" to host it. It will cost one diamond. Finished. Hosting a Trading Party in your Den Buy a fun den. The Water Park Den is recommended. More people enjoy the party when you have that den (it has water slides!). It is also vast and beautiful. You can add chairs, towels, umbrellas and banners there to make it look like an official beach or waterpark. Decorate your den. Make it look totally awesome! If you don't know how to decorate your den, read this article. However, a few ideal looks are listed below: Put a Tiki Torch in the middle of the bottom-floor pool. Surround it with Tiki chairs or beach-chairs. At the ground, left of the pool, arrange 4-6 towels with umbrellas above them. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/dc\/Host-a-Trading-Party-on-Animal-Jam-%28Members%29-Step-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Host-a-Trading-Party-on-Animal-Jam-%28Members%29-Step-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/dc\/Host-a-Trading-Party-on-Animal-Jam-%28Members%29-Step-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Host-a-Trading-Party-on-Animal-Jam-%28Members%29-Step-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"} Go to Jamaa Township and say something like "Epic trading party, my den!" You can also advertise attractive things to get people to want to come. For example, you can say you're also hosting a small giveaway, etc. Wait until at least 7-10 people are at your den. Then say "Last calling for a trading party in my den!" Don't go on for too long. Once there are 7-10 people at your den, go back. Your traders may not like it that you stay out advertising for too long. If a lot of people are there, start trading and have fun! If not go back to Jamaa Township and repeat steps 3 and 4. Remember, no matter what happens, enjoy yourself like a true trader!
